txt.en: Make your way to Grothum and ask Tyrant Búrzgoth for guidance on how to corrupt the sapling.
'Búrzgoth suggested this? Maybe I misjudged the troll's capacity for thought and reason.\n\n'This will serve us well, indeed.'
Búrzgoth suggested killing bears for their haunches and feeding them to your to your sapling... not a terrible idea from a troll.
'Go to Grothum, cur. Búrzgoth is a Tyrant not only for its strength, but also its - no it is only because the troll is strong. Still, ask it for advice. For amusement perhaps?'
Cinaid is unsure that they can help, but he wants to find some dark humour in the development of your sapling. He directed you to seek out the assistance of trolls.
'Time for fun. Seek out Tyrant Búrzgoth at Grothum and ask the troll how it would corrupt a sapling. This should be amusing.'
Speak with Tyrant Búrzgoth at Grothum
Deliver Morningthaw haunches to Cinaid at Gramsfoot
